alert.note: Alert for Eastern Louisa; Western Hanover; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 10:37PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN LOUISA COUNTY THROUGH 1130 PM EDT... At 1037 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mineral, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mineral around 1040 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Orchid, Pendleton, Yanceyville, Louisa Airport, Fredericks Hall, Wares Crossroads, Locust Creek, Apple Grove, and Cuckoo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Louisa; Western Hanover; Western Louisa
